Posts.Content: Jun 29, 2010 08:08PM Chris-rae wrote: Hi, I'm wondering about the same thing.  I finished my rad. the 24 of March 2010.  Just the last month or so, my breast has become  sore.  Uncomfortable to lay on that side in bed.  I had my surgery in August of last year.  I hope someone can help answer our question.   Good luck to you
